text: Eva Ottawa is an Atikamekw political figure. She was the first women to be elected Grand Chief of the Conseil de la Nation Atikamekw and the first Indigenous woman to lead the Conseil du statut de la femme du Québec. She received the Queen Elizabeth II Diamond Jubilee Medal in 2012 and the Médaille Premiers Peuples in 2019. She is currently a law professor at the University of Ottawa. == References == Category:Indigenous leaders in Canada Category:First Nations women Category:Atikamekw people Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:University of Ottawa faculty
title: Eva Ottawa
